pageContext.claim: “So, nobody has done more [to fight terrorism] than what I've done.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a tough sell. Former president George W. Bush set up the Department of Homeland Security and began the war on terror. Former president Barack Obama set up the majority of the infrastructure to fight ISIS and oversaw the targeted killing of Osama bin Laden. Moreover, many of Trump's programs to counter violent extremism look like Obama's, according to a Lawfare analysis.
